NewDataSet.title: NewDataSet
NewDataSet.description: This model represents a data set (tsType: Omit<DataSet, 'id'>, schemaOptions: { title: 'NewDataSet', exclude: [ 'id' ] })

name.description: The name of the data set

dataSetQuery.description: The query for the data set refer to StructuredQueryInterface

dataSetQuerySQL.description: The query for the data set refer to standard SQL

dataSetQueryHash.description: The hash of the query for the data set

extId.description: The external id of the data set

extMetadata.description: The external metadata of the data set

updateDataSet.title: updateDataSet
updateDataSet.description: This model represents a data set (tsType: Partial<DataSet>, schemaOptions: { title: 'updateDataSet', partial: true })

id.description: The unique identifier for a data set

name.description: The name of the data set

dataSetQuery.description: The query for the data set refer to StructuredQueryInterface

dataSetQuerySQL.description: The query for the data set refer to standard SQL

dataSetQueryHash.description: The hash of the query for the data set

extId.description: The external id of the data set

extMetadata.description: The external metadata of the data set

DataSet.title: DataSet
DataSet.description: This model represents a data set

id.description: The unique identifier for a data set

name.description: The name of the data set

dataSetQuery.description: The query for the data set refer to StructuredQueryInterface

dataSetQuerySQL.description: The query for the data set refer to standard SQL

dataSetQueryHash.description: The hash of the query for the data set

extId.description: The external id of the data set

extMetadata.description: The external metadata of the data set

IngestionMapping.title: IngestionMapping
IngestionMapping.description: This model represents a ingestion mapping, it maps the datasource to the record type

dataSourceName.description: The datasource name for the ingestion mapping

recordType.description: The record type for the ingestion mapping

primaryColumn.description: The primary column for the ingestion mapping

columnTransformations.description: The column transformations for the ingestion mapping, refer to ColumnMappings interface

permissions.description: The permissions for the ingestion mapping

IngestionMappingPartial.title: IngestionMappingPartial
IngestionMappingPartial.description: This model represents a ingestion mapping, it maps the datasource to the record type (tsType: Partial<IngestionMapping>, schemaOptions: { partial: true })

dataSourceName.description: The datasource name for the ingestion mapping

recordType.description: The record type for the ingestion mapping

primaryColumn.description: The primary column for the ingestion mapping

columnTransformations.description: The column transformations for the ingestion mapping, refer to ColumnMappings interface

permissions.description: The permissions for the ingestion mapping

originalDataType.description: Original data type of the column

StateTracking.title: StateTracking
StateTracking.description: This model represents a state tracking for the ingested data

id.description: The unique identifier for a state tracking

state.description: The state of the ingested data

payload.description: The payload of the ingested data

recordType.description: The type of the ingested data

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the ingested data

error.description: The error of the ingested data if any

recordId.description: The id of the ingested data

id.description: The unique identifier for a widget

datasetId.description: The id of the dataset that is to be used for the widget

visualizationType.description: The type of visualization to be used for the widget

extId.description: The external id of the widget

extMetadata.description: The external metadata of the widget

new Widget.title: new Widget

visualizationType.description: The type of visualization to be used for the widget

extId.description: The external id of the widget

extMetadata.description: The external metadata of the widget

id.description: The unique identifier for a dashboard

NewDashboard.description: This model represents a dashboard (tsType: CreateDashboardDto, schemaOptions: { title: 'NewDashboard' })
